titleStmt.title: The English chronology being a brief chronological account of the most considerable publick occurrences that have happen'd in these kingdoms, and other adjacent parts, since King William the Third's accession to the crown. From 1688, to 1696.
titleStmt.author: Smithurst, Benjamine.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by L. Lichfield, for John Howell bookseller,

notesStmt.note: With an initial advertisement leaf, and errata on pi2v.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
